test_cases.test_name: Verify Custom Workflow Engine Functionality
test_cases.objective: To ensure the custom workflow engine handles parallel processing paths, complex exception handling, and site-specific business rules as specified in URS-MES-004.

test_steps.action: Initiate a batch record with parallel processing paths.
test_steps.expected_result: System processes parallel paths without errors.

test_steps.action: Simulate a deviation in one of the processing paths.
test_steps.expected_result: System correctly handles the deviation and triggers the appropriate exception handling workflow.

test_steps.action: Apply site-specific business rules to the batch record.
test_steps.expected_result: System enforces the business rules and processes the batch accordingly.

acceptance_criteria: All parallel paths processed correctly
Deviations handled as per workflow
Business rules enforced accurately
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure all data is captured and stored securely
Audit trail must be maintained for all actions

test_cases.test_name: Validate Real-Time Data Collection Latency
test_cases.objective: To verify that the system collects real-time data with a maximum latency of 2 seconds as specified in URS-MES-012.

test_steps.action: Start a batch process and initiate real-time data collection.
test_steps.expected_result: System begins collecting data immediately.

test_steps.action: Monitor the latency of data collection over a 10-minute period.
test_steps.expected_result: Data collection latency does not exceed 2 seconds at any point.

test_steps.action: Generate a report of the latency measurements.
test_steps.expected_result: Report shows all latency measurements within the acceptable range.

acceptance_criteria: Data collection latency ≤ 2 seconds
No data loss during collection
Report generated accurately
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure all data is captured and stored securely
Audit trail must be maintained for all actions

test_cases.test_name: Custom Workflow Engine Functionality Verification
test_cases.objective: Verify that the custom workflow engine correctly handles parallel processing paths, complex exception handling, and site-specific business rules.

test_steps.action: Initiate a batch record with parallel processing paths.
test_steps.expected_result: System correctly processes parallel paths without errors.

test_steps.action: Simulate a deviation and trigger exception handling.
test_steps.expected_result: System correctly handles the deviation according to predefined rules.

test_steps.action: Apply site-specific business rules to a batch record.
test_steps.expected_result: System enforces site-specific rules accurately.

acceptance_criteria: All parallel paths processed correctly
Deviations handled as per rules
Site-specific rules enforced accurately
data_integrity_requirements: Audit trail must capture all actions
Data must be immutable once recorded

test_cases.test_name: Custom Mobile Application Data Entry Validation
test_cases.objective: Validate that the custom mobile application correctly captures and transmits shop floor data to the MES.

test_steps.action: Enter test data into the mobile application.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is correctly captured and displayed in the application.

test_steps.action: Transmit the entered data to the MES.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is successfully transmitted and recorded in the MES.

test_steps.action: Verify the data in the MES.
test_steps.expected_result: Data in the MES matches the data entered in the mobile application.

acceptance_criteria: Data correctly captured in mobile application
Data successfully transmitted to MES
Data in MES matches mobile application entry
data_integrity_requirements: Audit trail must capture all data entries
Data must be immutable once recorded

test_cases.test_name: Custom Workflow Engine Parallel Processing Test
test_cases.objective: Verify the custom workflow engine handles parallel processing paths unique to the manufacturing process.

test_steps.action: Initiate a batch record with parallel processing paths.
test_steps.expected_result: System correctly identifies and processes parallel paths.

test_steps.action: Simulate a deviation in one of the parallel paths.
test_steps.expected_result: System handles the deviation according to complex exception handling rules.

acceptance_criteria: Parallel paths are processed correctly
Deviations are handled as per business rules
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure all data is captured and stored securely
Audit trail must record all actions

test_cases.test_name: Custom APIs for Third-Party System Integration Test
test_cases.objective: Validate the custom APIs for seamless integration with third-party systems.

test_steps.action: Send a test data payload from the MES to a third-party system using the custom API.
test_steps.expected_result: Third-party system receives the data payload correctly.

test_steps.action: Retrieve data from the third-party system using the custom API.
test_steps.expected_result: MES receives the data correctly and processes it as expected.

acceptance_criteria: Data is transmitted and received correctly
API handles data exchange without errors
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data integrity during transmission
Audit trail must record all API calls

test_cases.test_name: Custom Mobile Application Functional Test
test_cases.objective: Verify the functionality of the custom mobile application for shop floor data entry as per URS-MES-006.
prerequisites: Shop floor data entry scenarios prepared

test_steps.action: Launch the mobile application and log in using test credentials.
test_steps.expected_result: User successfully logs in and the main menu is displayed.

test_steps.action: Enter sample shop floor data into the application.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is entered without errors and saved correctly.

test_steps.action: Submit the entered data to the MES.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is successfully submitted and visible in the MES.

acceptance_criteria: Mobile application functions as expected
Data is accurately captured and submitted
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data integrity during transmission
Verify data accuracy

test_cases.test_name: Custom Analytics Module Performance Test
test_cases.objective: Validate the performance of the bespoke analytics module for real-time process monitoring as per URS-MES-007.

test_steps.action: Load the analytics module with a large test data set.
test_steps.expected_result: Module loads data without errors and initializes correctly.

test_steps.action: Execute real-time process monitoring queries.
test_steps.expected_result: Queries execute within the specified latency of 2 seconds.

test_steps.action: Generate complex reports using the analytics module.
test_steps.expected_result: Reports are generated within 10 minutes as specified.

acceptance_criteria: Analytics module performs within specified latency
Reports are generated within the required time frame
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data accuracy during processing
Verify report integrity

test_cases.test_name: Custom Workflow Engine Parallel Processing Verification
test_cases.objective: Verify the custom workflow engine handles parallel processing paths unique to the manufacturing process as specified in URS-MES-004.

test_steps.action: Initiate a batch record with parallel processing paths.
test_steps.expected_result: System correctly identifies and processes parallel paths.

test_steps.action: Simulate a deviation in one of the parallel paths.
test_steps.expected_result: System handles the deviation according to complex exception handling rules.

acceptance_criteria: Parallel paths are processed correctly
Deviations are handled as per business rules
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure all data entries are accurate and traceable

test_cases.test_name: Custom APIs for Third-Party System Integration Test
test_cases.objective: Validate the custom APIs developed for third-party system integration as per URS-MES-014.

test_steps.action: Send a test data packet from the MES to the third-party system using the custom API.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is successfully received and processed by the third-party system.

test_steps.action: Retrieve data from the third-party system using the custom API.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is successfully retrieved and displayed in the MES.

acceptance_criteria: Data is accurately transmitted and retrieved
API functions as expected
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data integrity during transmission and retrieval

test_cases.test_name: Custom Mobile Application Shop Floor Data Entry Validation
test_cases.objective: To verify that the custom mobile application correctly captures and processes shop floor data entry in real-time.

test_steps.action: Enter test data into the mobile application for a specific batch record.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is successfully captured and displayed in the application interface.

test_steps.action: Submit the entered data to the MES.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is successfully transmitted to the MES and reflected in the batch record.

acceptance_criteria: All entered data is accurately captured and transmitted to the MES.
No data loss or corruption occurs during transmission.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data integrity during transmission
Verify data accuracy post-transmission

test_cases.test_name: Custom Analytics Module Real-Time Process Monitoring
test_cases.objective: To validate that the custom analytics module provides real-time process monitoring with accurate data analysis.

test_steps.action: Initiate a test batch process and monitor using the analytics module.
test_steps.expected_result: Real-time process data is displayed in the analytics module interface.

test_steps.action: Analyze the process data for anomalies or deviations.
test_steps.expected_result: Analytics module correctly identifies and reports any process anomalies or deviations.

acceptance_criteria: Real-time process data is accurately monitored and analyzed.
All anomalies or deviations are correctly identified and reported.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure real-time data integrity
Verify accuracy of anomaly detection

test_cases.test_name: Custom Workflow Engine Parallel Processing Verification
test_cases.objective: Verify the custom workflow engine correctly handles parallel processing paths unique to the manufacturing process.

test_steps.action: Initiate a batch record with parallel processing paths configured.
test_steps.expected_result: System correctly identifies and initiates all parallel paths.

test_steps.action: Simulate completion of one processing path while others are still active.
test_steps.expected_result: System maintains integrity of other processing paths and prevents premature batch completion.

acceptance_criteria: All parallel processing paths are correctly initiated and maintained
System prevents premature batch completion when some paths are still active
data_integrity_requirements: All processing path data must be accurately recorded and timestamped
No data loss during parallel processing

test_cases.test_name: Custom API Integration with Third-Party Systems
test_cases.objective: Verify the custom APIs successfully integrate with specified third-party systems.

test_steps.action: Invoke custom API to send test data to third-party system.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is successfully transmitted and received by third-party system.

test_steps.action: Request data from third-party system using custom API.
test_steps.expected_result: Correct data is retrieved and displayed in MES interface.

acceptance_criteria: Data is accurately transmitted and received between systems
API responses occur within expected timeframes
data_integrity_requirements: All transmitted data must maintain integrity
No data corruption during transmission

test_cases.test_name: Custom Audit Trail Verification
test_cases.objective: Verify the custom audit trail implementation captures all required metadata and maintains data integrity.
prerequisites: Test user accounts with appropriate permissions
Sample batch records available for testing

test_steps.action: Log in to the system with a test user account.
test_steps.expected_result: User is successfully logged in and can access the system.

test_steps.action: Create a new batch record and modify an existing one.
test_steps.expected_result: Batch records are created and modified successfully.

test_steps.action: Review the audit trail entries for the created and modified records.
test_steps.expected_result: Audit trail shows all actions with timestamps, user IDs, and metadata.

acceptance_criteria: Audit trail captures all required metadata for each action.
No gaps or missing entries in the audit trail.
Data integrity is maintained throughout the process.
data_integrity_requirements: All changes must be traceable
Metadata must include timestamp, user ID, and action details

test_cases.test_name: Real-Time Data Collection Latency Test
test_cases.objective: Verify the system meets the requirement of real-time data collection with maximum 2-second latency.
prerequisites: Test equipment connected to the system
Sample data points available for testing

test_steps.action: Configure the test equipment to send data to the system.
test_steps.expected_result: Equipment is successfully connected and ready to send data.

test_steps.action: Send a series of data points from the equipment to the system.
test_steps.expected_result: Data points are received by the system.

test_steps.action: Measure the time between data transmission and system receipt.
test_steps.expected_result: Latency does not exceed 2 seconds for any data point.

acceptance_criteria: All data points are received within 2 seconds of transmission.
No data loss or corruption during transmission.
System processes the data in real-time as expected.
data_integrity_requirements: Data must be received and processed without loss
Timestamps must be accurate

test_cases.test_name: Custom Workflow Engine Parallel Processing Verification
test_cases.objective: Verify the custom workflow engine correctly handles parallel processing paths unique to the manufacturing process.

test_steps.action: Initiate a batch record with parallel processing paths.
test_steps.expected_result: System correctly identifies and initiates all parallel paths.

test_steps.action: Simulate completion of one processing path while others are still active.
test_steps.expected_result: System maintains integrity of active paths and correctly updates completed path status.

test_steps.action: Complete all remaining processing paths.
test_steps.expected_result: System correctly finalizes batch record when all paths are complete.

acceptance_criteria: All parallel processing paths are correctly initiated and managed
System maintains data integrity throughout parallel processing
Batch record status updates correctly reflect process completion
data_integrity_requirements: All parallel paths must maintain independent audit trails
No data corruption between parallel processes
urs_requirements: URS-MES-004: Custom workflow engine to handle parallel processing paths

test_cases.test_name: Custom API Integration with Third-Party Systems
test_cases.objective: Verify the custom APIs correctly facilitate data exchange with third-party systems.

test_steps.action: Send test batch data from MES to third-party system using custom API.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is successfully transmitted and received by third-party system.

test_steps.action: Retrieve data from third-party system using custom API.
test_steps.expected_result: Requested data is successfully retrieved and displayed in MES.

test_steps.action: Verify API error handling by sending malformed requests.
test_steps.expected_result: System correctly identifies and reports API errors.

acceptance_criteria: Data is accurately transmitted between systems
API responses meet documented specifications
Error conditions are properly handled
data_integrity_requirements: All API transactions must be logged
Data transformations must maintain accuracy
urs_requirements: URS-MES-014: Develop custom APIs for third-party system integration

test_cases.test_name: Custom Workflow Engine Parallel Processing Validation
test_cases.objective: Verify the custom workflow engine correctly handles parallel processing paths unique to the manufacturing process.

test_steps.action: Initiate a batch record with parallel processing paths
test_steps.expected_result: System correctly identifies and initiates all parallel paths

test_steps.action: Simulate completion of different paths at varying times
test_steps.expected_result: System maintains correct state for each independent path

test_steps.action: Force a deviation in one processing path
test_steps.expected_result: System isolates deviation impact to affected path only

acceptance_criteria: All parallel paths execute independently without interference
System correctly handles path-specific deviations
Final batch record reflects accurate parallel processing history
data_integrity_requirements: Complete audit trail of parallel path execution
Immutable timestamps for all path transitions
No cross-path data corruption
urs_requirements: URS-MES-004: Custom workflow engine to handle parallel processing paths

test_cases.test_name: Proprietary Data Structures Validation for Conditional BOMs
test_cases.objective: Validate the system correctly handles multi-level bill of materials with conditional components.
prerequisites: Test BOMs with conditional components created

test_steps.action: Create batch record using BOM with conditional components
test_steps.expected_result: System correctly evaluates and applies all conditions

test_steps.action: Modify process parameters to trigger different conditional paths
test_steps.expected_result: System dynamically adjusts BOM components based on new conditions

test_steps.action: Verify database storage of conditional BOM structure
test_steps.expected_result: All conditional logic and resulting components stored accurately

acceptance_criteria: All conditional components evaluated and applied correctly
Changes in conditions immediately reflected in active BOM
Complete historical record of BOM variations maintained
data_integrity_requirements: Complete traceability of BOM component decisions
Immutable record of all BOM versions
No unauthorized modification of conditional logic
urs_requirements: URS-MES-005: Develop proprietary data structures for multi-level BOMs

test_cases.test_name: Custom Workflow Engine Parallel Processing Verification
test_cases.objective: Verify the custom workflow engine correctly handles parallel processing paths unique to the manufacturing process.

test_steps.action: Initiate a batch record with parallel processing paths.
test_steps.expected_result: System correctly identifies and initiates all parallel paths.

test_steps.action: Simulate completion of one processing path.
test_steps.expected_result: System updates the status of the completed path without affecting other paths.

test_steps.action: Complete all remaining processing paths.
test_steps.expected_result: System correctly finalizes the batch record when all paths are completed.

acceptance_criteria: All parallel processing paths are correctly initiated and managed.
System maintains data integrity across all paths.
Batch record is correctly finalized upon completion of all paths.
data_integrity_requirements: All processing paths must be accurately tracked and recorded.
Audit trail must capture all significant actions.

test_cases.test_name: Real-Time Data Collection Latency Test
test_cases.objective: Verify the system meets the requirement for real-time data collection with maximum 2-second latency.

test_steps.action: Generate a simulated equipment data point.
test_steps.expected_result: Data point is detected by the system.

test_steps.action: Measure time between data generation and system recording.
test_steps.expected_result: Latency does not exceed 2 seconds.

test_steps.action: Repeat test with 100 concurrent data points.
test_steps.expected_result: All data points are recorded within 2 seconds.

acceptance_criteria: All data points are recorded within 2 seconds of generation.
System maintains performance under concurrent data load.
No data loss occurs during high-volume testing.
data_integrity_requirements: All data points must be accurately recorded with correct timestamps.
No data corruption during high-volume transmission.

test_cases.test_name: Custom Mobile Application Data Entry Verification
test_cases.objective: Verify that the custom mobile application correctly captures and transmits shop floor data entry to the MES.

test_steps.action: Enter test data into the mobile application fields.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is correctly displayed in the application interface.

test_steps.action: Submit the data to the MES.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is successfully transmitted and appears in the MES batch record.

acceptance_criteria: All entered data is accurately captured and transmitted to the MES.
data_integrity_requirements: Data must be complete, consistent, and accurate.

test_cases.test_name: Real-Time Process Monitoring Analytics Verification
test_cases.objective: Validate that the bespoke analytics module provides real-time process monitoring with accurate data analysis.

test_steps.action: Initiate real-time process monitoring on the analytics module.
test_steps.expected_result: Module displays real-time process data.

test_steps.action: Analyze the displayed data for accuracy and completeness.
test_steps.expected_result: Data analysis results match expected process parameters.

acceptance_criteria: Real-time data is accurately analyzed and displayed.
data_integrity_requirements: Data must be real-time, accurate, and complete.

test_cases.test_name: Real-Time Process Monitoring Analytics Module Verification

test_cases.test_name: Custom Reporting Module Performance Verification
test_cases.objective: Validate that the custom reporting module generates complex reports within the specified time frame.

test_steps.action: Initiate a complex report generation request.
test_steps.expected_result: Report generation process starts without errors.

test_steps.action: Monitor the report generation process.
test_steps.expected_result: Report is completed within 10 minutes.

acceptance_criteria: Reports are generated within 10 minutes for complex queries.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data accuracy in reports
